channel.title: seminar on Ryan Moodie
channel.description: Recent content in seminar on Ryan Moodie

item.title: Cavendish HEP seminar: NLO QCD corrections to diphoton-plus-jet production through gluon fusion at the LHC
item.description: I gave a talk in the Cavendish HEP seminar series. It covered the same content as a previous talk. Here are the slides (source).

item.title: IPPP internal seminar: NLO QCD corrections to diphoton-plus-jet production through gluon fusion at hadron colliders
item.description: I gave a talk in the IPPP internal seminar series about my recent work on diphoton-plus-jet production via gluon fusion, including: Next-to-leading order QCD corrections to diphoton-plus-jet production through gluon fusion at the LHC Virtual QCD corrections to gluon-initiated diphoton plus jet production at hadron colliders Optimising simulations for diphoton production at hadron colliders using amplitude neural networks Here are the slides (source).
